description.summary: A creature that spins in circles so rapidly it becomes invisible, creating whirlwinds and dust devils as it moves through the forest.
description.full: The Whirling Whimpus is one of the most peculiar fearsome critters, known for its constant and incredibly rapid spinning motion. This creature rotates so fast that it becomes completely invisible to observers, detectable only by the whirlwinds, dust devils, and spinning debris it creates. According to lumberjack tall tales, the Whirling Whimpus never stops spinningâ€”if it did, it would become visible and vulnerable. The creature moves through forests creating miniature tornados, explaining sudden gusts of wind and swirling leaves. The Whirling Whimpus represents the fearsome critter tradition's playful explanation for natural phenomena, turning dust devils into biological impossibilities.

features.description: Rotates so rapidly as to become invisible
Generates dust devils and small tornados

abilities.description: Spins so fast it cannot be seen
Creates dust devils and spinning wind patterns

habitat_preference: open areas where dust devils occur

range.description: Anywhere dust devils and sudden wind gusts occur

origins.cultural_roots: American occupational folklore from lumber camps
origins.folklore_connections: Humorous explanation for dust devils and sudden wind gusts

folklore.beliefs: Explained natural phenomenon (dust devils) as invisible spinning creature
